name: Restyle : /g/ - Twitter
description:
Eh, makes twitter looks similar to /g/. Not the other way around, as the title may have led you to believe.

Sources : http://zip.4chan.org/yotsublue.9.css , http://zip.4chan.org/fade-blue.png , http://userstyles.org/styles/16947 , http://www.dailycoding.com/Utils/Converter/ImageToBase64.aspx

Also, thanks to mut80r in #/g/tech.
